definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
transponder/electronic device that responds to a radio code
pinyin: fa1 she4 ji1 ying4 da2 qi4

sentences.english: Intermodulation distortion is an important factor affecting the property of television transmitter.
sentences.chinese: 互调失真是影响电视发射机性能的一个重要因素。

sentences.english: The heating would be done from a transmitter outside the body.
sentences.chinese: 加热是由体外发射机来进行的。

sentences.english: Travel Wave Tube is the one of core part of transmitter in radar.
sentences.chinese: 行波管是雷达发射机中的核心部件之一。

sentences.english: Transmitters are key parts in microwave and millimeter-wave systems.
sentences.chinese: 发射机是微波毫米波系统必不可少的关键部分。

sentences.english: High-power klystron are used in radar transmitter more and more.
sentences.chinese: 大功率速调管在雷达发射机中的运用越来越广泛。

sentences.english: In this paper, the design of the PFM optic transmitter is developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了PFM光发射机的设计问题。

sentences.english: The foundation is given to design the good external modulator optical transmitter by calculating CSO.
sentences.chinese: 为设计性能良好的外调制光发射机提供了依据。

sentences.english: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.english: Each studio has its own transmitter. Earlier on the studios were located at the second floor.
sentences.chinese: 每一个演播室都有自己的发射机。

sentences.english: Corresponding to transmitter, receiver uses two down-conversions structure.
sentences.chinese: 与发射机相对应，接收机采用二次下变频的结构。

sentences.english: Are the ship's main radio transmitter aerials earthed and radars switched off?
sentences.chinese: 液货船上主无线电发射机天线已接地且雷达已关掉？

sentences.english: Finally, the problem in gyrotron transmitter is pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 指出了目前回旋管发射机存在的问题。

sentences.english: The weapon: flightless birds, launched by catapult.
sentences.chinese: 武器是不会飞的小鸟，通过发射机起飞。

sentences.english: Abstract : The emissive frequency of the general frequency modulation broadcast transmitter is fixed.
sentences.chinese: 一般的调频广播发射机，发射频率是固定的。

sentences.english: The transmitter is completed with two up-conversion structure.
sentences.chinese: 发射机采用二次上变频的发射机结构。

sentences.english: The transmitter is completed with two up-conversion structure.
sentences.chinese: 发射机采用二次上变频的发射机结构。

pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 jie1 shou1 ji1

definition: transceiver/radio frequency receiver, broadcaster or relay
pinyin: wu2 xian4 dian4 shou1 fa1 ji1
